headline: PPG introduces PPG MIX‘N’SHAKE automated stirring technology for body shops
summary: PITTSBURGH, October 14, 2025--PPG (NYSE: PPG) today announced the introduction of PPG MIX‘N’SHAKE™ automated stirring technology designed to eliminate traditional manual stirring methods in the automotive refinish industry. The system, which is available globally, improves paint mix consistency, reduces consumable waste and saves time for painters and body shops.
